message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $18000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's value to you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can find a price closer to my valuation of the product. I would like to propose a price of $16000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll offer the product to you for $17000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with a price of $16500 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not quite there, but I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $16750. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your efforts in negotiating, Alice. Considering the value of the product to me, I would like to propose a price of $16625 for the product.

I understand that you're getting close to your target price, Bob, but I'm still not ready to give in. I'll make one more compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $16800. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I'm getting closer to my target price. I would like to counter with a price of $16750 for the product.

I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I'll make one more compromise. I'll offer the product to you for $16900. This is the final price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value to me.
Alice, thank you for your patience and for continuing to negotiate. I appreciate your efforts and am willing to agree on a price of $16875 for the product.
